name: Advanced Image Biophysics Analysis Suite
release_name: Segmented FCS and Universal Alignment Integration
description: Comprehensive microscopy analysis with Segmented FCS and universal nuclear alignment
key_features: Segmented FCS analysis for line-scan data with temporal segmentation
Advanced FCS models: 2D, 3D, and anomalous diffusion fitting
Universal nuclear alignment across all biophysical analyses
Phase correlation, optical flow, and feature-based registration
Automatic reliability assessment and quality metrics
PyTorch conflict resolution for Streamlit compatibility
Scientifically accurate RICS, FCS, iMSD, FRAP, FLIM, SPT, N&B analyses
Enhanced AI-driven image processing and segmentation
new_in_v161: Segmented FCS analysis module with temporal segmentation
Support for 2D, 3D, and anomalous diffusion models
Parameter error estimation and quality assessment
Integration with nuclear alignment for time-series data
scientific_accuracy: Segmented FCS: Proper autocorrelation with temporal segmentation
iMSD: Feature-based particle tracking with trackpy
FCS: Proper correlation analysis with multipletau
All methods: Nuclear alignment preprocessing for temporal stability
